h4.span: A CULTURAL DINING EXPERIENCE at estância

p.span: At Estância Brazilian Steakhouse, we bring you a unique cultural dining experience. Enjoy the flavors of Brazil with our delectable meats, extensive salad bar, and traditional Brazilian side dishes. At Estância, you eat at your own pace and to your heart’s content.

p.span: Refresh yourself with our tasty selection of traditional Brazilian cocktails, signature digestif drinks, and our award-winning selection of wines from all over the world.

div.class: tatsu-module tatsu-normal-button tatsu-button-wrap align-block block-center tatsu-fpcu3os8do8jz5f

p.span: With four private rooms to choose from, Estância has the capacity to comfortably accommodate up to 200 guests. Our full service staff and dedicated event coordinator will ensure an unparalleled experience for any occasion.

div.span: Dine with us and receive one complimentary lunch or dinner card to apply towards a future visit when you dine with us for lunch or dinner on November 28th.

td.div: Our Commitment to Our Guests is Our #1 Priority during COVID-19
